toolTip.newPassword: Required field. LowerCase letters, upperCase letters, numbers and special Characters must include and length of password should grater than or equal to eight(>=8).
toolTip.repeatPassword: Required field. Should equal to the password that you already input.
toolTip.systemCompletedField: You are not privileged to edit this section. If there have some mistakes contact system administrator.
toolTip.telephone: Required field. Provide a telephone number, that currently working. Mobile number or landline number are acceptable. Data format: 0xxxxxxxxx Example values: 0332212543, 071123532
toolTip.address: Required field. Example value: No.243/13, Gall Rd, Colombo 05
toolTip.personalEmail: Required field. Example Value" test@gmail.com, user@outlook.com
